domain.title: Domain
domain.description: Select the URL of the Amazon Best Sellers page you want to extract.

categoryUrls.title: Category Urls
categoryUrls.description: Choose specific categories to scrape. Example URL: https://www.amazon.com/Best-Sellers-Automotive/zgbs/automotive. If this field is empty, top level results are chosen

depthOfCrawl.title: Depth of crawl
depthOfCrawl.description: How many subcategories would you like to visit? Minimum working value is 1, maximum is 2. Amazon Best Sellers includes 37 main categories. All of these have at least one more level of subcategorisation. Setting a crawl depth of 2 returns roughly 550 subcategories, each with 100 results. If you would like to extract more subcategories, please, get in touch.

proxy.title: Proxy configuration
proxy.description: Select proxies to be used by your crawler. For more information, visit https://docs.apify.com/proxy
